name: agallet
story:
Air Gallet is a vertically scrolling shoot'em up. You fly a fighter jet and have to defend yourself against airborne as well as terrain enemies, the end of each stage having the usual boss fight. Aside from the futuristic weaponry the game has a present-day military theme.

You have four weapons, laser beam, support drone, tracing missile or vulcan spread shot. For each you can collect up to four power-ups.
